resources.string: Choose a list for your shopping
You have not added any lists yet
You have not added any items yet
Press the \'Edit Items\' button in the home page.\nThen press the \'Add Item\' button, fill in the form with the characteristics you want and hit the \'Add Item\' button.
Press the \'Edit Items\' button in the home page.\nCheck the boxxes of the items you want to delete and hit the \'Delete Items\' button.
Press the \'Edit Items\' button in the home page.\nClick on the item you want to edit, update the characteristics you want and hit the \'Edit Item\' button.
Press the \'Edit Lists\' button in the home page.\nThen press the \'Add List\' button, type the name you want the list to have and hit the \'Add List\' button.
Press the \'Edit Lists\' button in the home page.\nCheck the boxxes of the lists you want to delete and hit the \'Delete Lists\' button.
Press the \'Edit Lists\' button in the home page.\nClick on the list you want to edit.

Once you have selected the list you want to edit, press the \'Add Items\' button.\nThen select an item you want to add, or add a new one first with the \'Add New Item\' button, type in the quantity you want and hit the \'Add Item\' button.
Once you have selected the list you want to edit, check the boxxes of the items you want to delete and hit the \'Delete Items\' button.
Editing quantity of item in list
Once you have selected the list you want to edit, click on the item whose quantity you want to edit, type in the new quantity and hit the \'Save\' button.
Press the \'Shopping\' button in the home page.\nThen click on the list you want to buy from.

Once you have chosen the list you want to shop from, you can use the + and - buttons to add and subtract to and from the quantity of the item.\nIf you have placed an item into your cart you can check the box and its price will be added to the \'Current Price\' at the bottom.
